isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - DESCRIPTION - Power Source (Sleeper) W/48, 60 Inch Flat Roof Sleeper

svcproc.title: Power Source (Sleeper) W/48, 60 Inch Flat Roof Sleeper
svcproc.para: Two Power Sources (power sockets) are provided to enable 12 volt accessories to be plugged in. One socket is located in the master console and the other socket is located at the other end of the bunk.
